}} "'My Legendary Girlfriend'" is the first single from the album
[[Separations]] by British band Pulp. The single was first released in 1991 on
12" vinyl and then in 1996 on CD featuring the original track-listing. "Is This
House?" and "This House Is Condemned" were remixed by Parrot (Richard Barratt)
and Winston (Winston Hazel).

There is a 7" vinyl limited edition of 500 copies version of the single released
in 1992 on Bob Stanley's label Caff Records. The new A-side "My Legendary
Girlfriend" was taken from 11th September 1991 live BBC soundcheck. "Sickly
Grin" and "Back in L.A." are 1982 and 1984 demos accordingly.
